rankdata.description: The metal forming process known as investment casting dates back almost 5,000 years. Other names for this technique include lost-wax casting and precision casting. Manufacturers use this technique to accurately cast metals with a high heat tolerance using a plaster, plastic, or ceramic mold and a wax pattern that melts away
